sentences.en: A few militant members of the crowd attacked the vendor.
sentences.cn: 人群中几个好斗的人攻击了那个小贩.

sentences.en: As registered proprietor, only the vendor can do so.
sentences.cn: 因为只有产权注册人即卖方方能启用相关条款.

sentences.en: Ernest Defarge, wine - vendor of St. Antoine. "
sentences.cn: 欧内斯特.德伐日, 圣安托万区酒店主. ”

sentences.en: He must inform the vendor immediately.
If you suspect write - caching to be the problem, contact your hardware vendor.
sentences.cn: 如果您怀疑写缓存的问题, 请联系您的硬件供应商.

sentences.en: Is the vendor always held responsible if goods are faulty?
sentences.cn: 如果产品有瑕疵,卖主是否一定要负责到底?

sentences.en: It also critical, different quality requirements can choose what kind of vendor.
sentences.cn: 这一点也很关键, 不同的质量要求可以决定找怎样的供应商.

sentences.en: Kevin stopped to buy the evening paper from a news vendor.
sentences.cn: 凯文停下来向报贩买了一份晚报.

sentences.en: Remember, the estate agent is working for the vendor.
sentences.cn: 记住，房地产代理商是为房地产卖方服务的。

sentences.en: Such modifications may require corresponding changes to be made in Vendor's Service.
sentences.cn: 该修改可能需要贩售商服务也有相对应的变更.

sentences.en: The vendor beamed and began tearing off the usual 1 / 100 ticket.
sentences.cn: 彩票推销员微笑着,把通常的1/100一张彩票撕下来.

sentences.en: The vendor shall deliver the goods to the vendee by June 15.
sentences.cn: 卖方须在6月15日前将货交给买方.

sentences.en: The vendor was a venerable Irishman.
sentences.cn: 小贩是个可敬的爱尔兰老人.

sentences.en: Work with QA to resolved customer and vendor quality issue.
sentences.cn: 和质量人员一起解决客户和供应商的质量问题.

trans.tran_cn: 摊贩，小贩，卖主，[贸易]自动售货机，<正式>供应商
trans.tran_en: someone who sells things, especially on the street
